AT.name: Breath of Fire™
AT.description: Vor langer Zeit wurde die Welt beinahe durch den Krieg zwischen den Drachenclans zerstört. Heute, Jahrhunderte nachdem die Licht- und Dunkeldrachen ihre Auseinandersetzung beendet haben, erwacht das Böse erneut! Schließ dich Ryu, einem Nachfahren der Lichtdrachen mit der Fähigkeit, sich in eine mächtige Bestie zu verwandeln, an. Begleite ihn, während er versucht, seine Schwester zu retten, und vereitele den Plan der Dunkeldrachen. Sieben Gefährten werden sich ihm auf seiner Reise anschließen, jeder mit einzigartigen Tierfähigkeiten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Breath of Fire™
AU.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

CZ.name: Breath of Fire™
CZ.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Breath of Fire™
BE.description: Il y a bien longtemps, la guerre au sein du Clan du Dragon avait presque anéanti la planète. Après des siècles de lutte entre les Dragons de Lumière et les Dragons Noirs, le mal refait désormais surface ! Rejoignez Ryu, un descendant des Dragons de Lumière qui a la capacité de se transformer en une puissante bête, sauvez sa sœur et déjouez les plans des Dragons Noirs. Sept de ses camarades ayant le pouvoir de se changer en animal l'accompagnent dans sa quête. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

HR.name: Breath of Fire™
HR.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

CA.name: BREATH OF FIRE
CA.description: In a distant land, peace was maintained for thousands of years by the powerful Dragon Clan. One day, the goddess Tyr appeared to them and offered to fulfill their every wish. Greed split the clans into the Dark Dragons and the Light Dragons, who battled to win Tyr's magic as she watched and encouraged their war. A warrior emerged from the Light Dragons, and with his seven companions, he sealed the goddess into another realm. Centuries have passed, and the Dark Dragons are destroying villages in search of the goddess keys to release Tyr from her prison. A new warrior must arise to face this latest blight! Join Ryu as he embarks on an adventure of a lifetime! He will need to rely on his companions if he is to rediscover the lost powers of the Light Dragons and save his sister, Sara, from the evil clutches of the Dark Dragons. Fight, and prove that the Warrior of the Dragon is not just a myth!

CY.name: Breath of Fire™
CY.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

BR.name: BREATH OF FIRE
BR.description: Em uma terra distante, a paz era mantida por séculos pelo clã do Dragão. Um dia, a deusa Tyr apareceu para eles e ofereceu realizar todos os seus desejos. Por causa de ambição, o clã foi dividido entre Dragões das Trevas e Dragões da Luz. Eles lutaram para ganhar a magia da deusa Tyr que os assistia e os encorajava a guerrear. Um guerreiro dos Dragões da Luz emergiu e, com os seus sete companheiros, aprisionou a deusa em outro reino. Séculos se passaram e os Dragões das Trevas destruíram vilas na busca pelas chaves para libertar a deusa Tyr da prisão. Um novo guerreiro deve surgir para enfrentar a mais recente calamidade! Junte-se ao Ryu enquanto ele embarca na aventura da sua vida! Ele precisa confiar em seus companheiros se quiser redescobrir os poderes perdidos dos Dragões da Luz e salvar sua irmã Sara das garras malignas dos Dragões das Trevas. Lute e prove que o guerreiro do dragão não é apenas um mito!

LV.name: Breath of Fire™
LV.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

GB.name: Breath of Fire™
GB.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

LT.name: Breath of Fire™
LT.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

ES.name: Breath of Fire™
ES.description: Hace mucho tiempo, la guerra entre los clanes de dragones estuvo a punto de destruir el planeta. Ahora, siglos después de que los Dragones de la Luz y los Dragones Oscuros ajustaran sus cuentas, la sombra del mal resurge con fuerza. Únete a Ryu, un descendiente de los Dragones de la Luz con la capacidad de transformarse en una bestia poderosa, y ayúdale a rescatar a su hermana y a acabar con los planes de los Dragones Oscuros. Para ello, contaréis con el apoyo de siete acompañantes con poderes animales únicos. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Breath of Fire™
IT.description: In un'epoca lontana, quando la guerra tra clan di draghi aveva condotto il mondo sull'orlo della rovina, le due fazioni rivali del Drago della Luce e del Drago dell'Ombra sembravano avere finalmente trovato la pace. Ma ora, a distanza di secoli, il male è tornato! Segui Ryu, l'eroico discendente dei Draghi della Luce capace di trasformarsi in una creatura portentosa, nella sua coraggiosa missione! Insieme a sette fedeli compagni, ciascuno dotato di bestiali abilità, dovrà salvare la sorella e sventare i piani degli antichi nemici. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NO.name: Breath of Fire™
NO.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

SE.name: Breath of Fire™
SE.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Breath of Fire™
PT.description: Numa época longínqua, a guerra entre os clãs de dragões esteve muito perto de causar a destruição do mundo. Agora, séculos depois dos Light Dragons e dos Dark Dragons terem aparentemente encontrado a paz, regressa novamente a sombra do mal! Junta-te a Ryu, um descendente dos Light Dragons, que possui a habilidade de se transformar num animal poderoso, e ajuda-o a resgatar a sua irmã e a destruir os planos dos Dark Dragons. Ele conta ainda com o apoio de um grupo de sete companheiros, cada um com poderes animais únicos. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

LU.name: Breath of Fire™
LU.description: Il y a bien longtemps, la guerre au sein du Clan du Dragon avait presque anéanti la planète. Après des siècles de lutte entre les Dragons de Lumière et les Dragons Noirs, le mal refait désormais surface ! Rejoignez Ryu, un descendant des Dragons de Lumière qui a la capacité de se transformer en une puissante bête, sauvez sa sœur et déjouez les plans des Dragons Noirs. Sept de ses camarades ayant le pouvoir de se changer en animal l'accompagnent dans sa quête. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

SK.name: Breath of Fire™
SK.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

MT.name: Breath of Fire™
MT.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: BREATH OF FIRE
MX.description: En una tierra lejana la paz se mantuvo durante miles de años gracias al Clan del Dragón. Un día, la diosa Tyr apareció y ofreció cumplirles todos los deseos. La codicia los dividió entre el Clan de los Dragones Oscuros y el Clan de los Dragones de la Luz, ambos combatieron por la magia de Tyr mientras ella los observaba alentando esta guerra. Pero un guerrero del Clan de los Dragones de la Luz emergió y con sus siete compañeros encerraron a la diosa en otro reino. Cientos de años han pasado y los Dragones Oscuros ahora están destruyendo pueblos buscando las llaves de la diosa para liberar a Tyr de su prisión. Un nuevo guerrero deberá surgir para enfrentar esta última desgracia. Únete a Ryu mientras se embarca en la aventura de su vida. Ryu tendrá que confiar en sus compañeros si quiere redescubrir los poderes perdidos de los Dragones de la Luz y salvar a su hermana Sara de las garras de los malvados Dragones Oscuros. ¡Lucha y demuestra que el guerrero de los dragones no es solo un mito!

RU.name: Breath of Fire™
RU.description: В незапамятные времена война между драконами Света и Тьмы почти уничтожила мир. Но в один прекрасный день эта вражда прекратилась, с тех пор прошли столетия, и зло вновь поднимает голову! Отправляйтесь навстречу приключениям вместе с Ryu, потомком драконов Света, способным перевоплощаться в мощного зверя. Ваша цель — спасти сестру главного героя и остановить темных драконов. Ryu объединяет свои усилия с семью спутниками, каждый из которых обладает уникальными способностями зверей. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

RO.name: Breath of Fire™
RO.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again! Join Ryu, a descendant of the Light Dragons, who has the ability to transform into a powerful beast, in a quest to rescue his sister and stop the Dark Dragons’ plans. He is joined by a band of seven companions, each with unique animal powers. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Breath of Fire™
NL.description: In een ver verleden dreigde de wereld te vernietigen door de oorlog tussen drakenstammen. Nu, na eeuwen van rust, is het kwaad herrezen! Ryu, een nakomeling van de Light Dragons, kan veranderen in een machtig beest. Volg hem op zijn avontuur om zijn zus te redden en de plannen van de Dark Dragons te dwarsbomen. Hij wordt vergezeld door een groep van 7 kompanen, elk met zijn eigen dierenkracht. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.description: Long ago, the war between the dragon clans almost destroyed the world. Now, centuries after the Light and Dark Dragons settled their scores, evil is rising again!
